0110001010110100 0001111000011110 0 -> sum: 1000000011010010, cout: 0
0111010100011110 0000100111100010 1 -> sum: 0111111100000001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
